name: beamo-website-v2
description: Beamo website - static site with build tooling

scripts.minify:js: mkdir -p public/js && terser src/js/main.js -o public/js/main.min.js -c -m --comments false
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:assets && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.test: npm run build && echo 'Build validation successful!'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages

author: lkgarcia
